titles.title: What's Love Got to Do With It Act
To promote commercial aviation service and economic development in the Dallas/Fort Worth region.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Aviation.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 7/21/2005--Introduced. What's Love Got to Do With It Act - Provides that if law takes effect that makes Love Field in Dallas, Texas ineligible to hold an airport operating certificate, the Des Moines International Airport in Des Moines, Iowa, and the Tulsa International Airport in Tulsa,Oklahoma, shall be ineligible to hold such certificates.
